text: thæ cring xallxh thrng xphaythosʹ hı kæ than nabi chaw mu ha yi rin læa cha wxans xr læw sung khea hela nan di ptibati tam khea (nabi)nı yam khabkhan hlangcak thi citcı khxng chnk lum hnung nı phwk khea keuxb ca hanhe xxk cak khwam cring læw phraxngkh k thrng xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk khea thæcring phraxngkh nan pen phuthrng metta phuthrng kruna xyu semx
